data.title: Episode 50: Battle of the Network Stars by Tell Them What They've Won
data.meta_description: This week we talk about the hottest cross network event from the 70s and 80s, Battle of the Network Stars. Plus, we talk smoking Telly Savalas, discuss an incredibly dangerous sport and what's to come in the next 50 episodes.Â  Join us as we turn 50!
data.text:
This week we talk about a show from 1981 that never actually made it to air: Temptation. We also talk about Ice Station Zebra, the new season of Floor is Lava and Christmas cards from John Ritter.

This week we go back to the 50's with a game show that combined trivia questions and connect the dots. We also talk about toothpaste, space, thrift store finds and the rising price of cold cuts. Join us!

This week Christian takes us back to the glorious age of Who Wants to be a Millionaire rip-offs. We might even argue that we are still in said age. Needless to say, Christian may or may not have caused some anger this week. Listen and find out.

This week we talk about the predecessor to Press Your Luck, Second Chance. We also talk about Team Ken vs. Team Mayim, Chuck Barris, and iconic 70s game show sets and contestants as well. And we try to stump Christian again.

This week we are talking about the amazing Canadian game show from the late 70s/early 80s: The Mad Dash. Plus we dive into waterproof earbuds, bull shoulders and debunk the dollar sign debacle of one line or two!?

Season four has arrived! Tom is back from surgery, Christian is here for more than the news and we totally dig on the game play of The Big Showdown! We also talk about upcoming cancelations, Is it cake?, and Jeopar-Day! Join us!

This week we are bringing you an update on what is going on with us, the show and what you can look forward to in season four!

This week we are talking about US game shows that went to Japan, Japanese game shows that came to the US and shows that only ever played in Japan. Plus, we dive deep into the true definition of âJapanese Game show,â Kenny G and of course, our tribute to the late Betty White.

This week we are talking about US game shows that went to Japan, Japanese game shows that came to the US and shows that only ever played in Japan. Plus, we dive deep into the true definition of âJapanese Game show,â Kenny G and of course, our tribute to the late Betty White.

This week we are featuring the reality game show American Idol. And we have a ton to say about it. Plus, on an episode about singing, Mike does none. But he breakdances.

This week we are featuring the reality game show American Idol. And we have a ton to say about it. Plus we break down the entire music industry, talk about most unwanted song in the world and we bring back more talk on good ole Shrimp Boogaloo.

This week we are featuring the game show Funhouse. The set was amazing, the host great, but could it compete with Double Dare? We also talk about Shrimp, Bad Video Games and even âbadderâ consolation prizes. Season Three is winding down, so don't miss it!

This week we are featuring the game show Holey Moley! And we have an interview with Holy Moley Season 3 Champion Rachel Lentsch! Rachel will take us behind the scenes and give us the tell-all about being on the show!

This week we are featuring the game show Holey Moley! And we have an interview with Holy Moley Season 3 Champion Rachel Lentch! Rachel will take us behind the scenes and tell everything we wanted to know about what goes on during the game! Don't miss it!

This week we are featuring the cooking reality game show, Top Chef And, as we often do, we revisit the meaning of a game show. Plus we talk about McDonaldâs Cheeseburgers, and announce some special upcoming interviews as well as Mike's fascination with western Jamaican fatback.

This week we are featuring the cooking reality game show, Top Chef and we get VERY specific about Emmy award categories. Plus we talk about McDonaldâs Cheeseburgers, some VERY special upcoming interviews and of course, Mike's fascination with western Jamaican fatback.

This week we are featuring a staple of the Jacobs' family, Name That Tune. We also talk about more fingers in fast food, arcade games, mike sings Icona Pop, and we drop a hot dog at the beach!

This week we are featuring a staple of the Jacobs' family, Name That Tune. We also discuss more fingers in fast food, arcade games, mike sings again, and we drop a hot dog at the beach!

This week we take a break from the norm and interview a friend of Mike's: Jeremy Mador. Jeremy shares his story of being on the show, winning and having some touching memories about being there!

This week we talk about the hottest cross network event from the 70s and 80s, Battle of the Network Stars. Plus, we talk smoking Telly Savalas, discuss an incredibly dangerous sport and what's to come in the next 50 episodes. Join us as we turn 50!

This week we talk about the hottest cross network event from the 70s and 80s. Plus, we think we can stump Christian (Ha!), Telly Savalas talk and we discuss an incredibly dangerous sport. Join us as we turn 50!

This week we talk about the fastest game show from the 70s, Split Second. We also dive into the Jeopardy hosting news and get Christian's take on the whole debacle. Not to mention soap operas, assassinations and more!

This week we go all the way back to radio days! Mike is super stoked to dive into this blast from the past. Christian tries to not get stumped. Plus we go off on a few tangents: Mork and Mindy, Knight Rider, Levar Burton, even American Geography! And someone gets shot in the face!

This week we go all the way back to radio days! Mike is super stoked to dive into this blast from the past. Plus we go off on a few tangents: Mork and Mindy, Knight Rider, Levar Burton, even American Geography! And someone gets shot in the face!

This week we talk about the game show 1 vs 100. We discuss the game show The Hustler and fail miserably on a fast money round of Family Feud. Plus, we have details for how you can win a pair of tickets for the Southern Fried Gaming Expo! And if anyone has purchased perfume by telemarketer, please let us know.

This week we talk about the game show that lasted only two seasons and change in the states but is still going strong for 22 years in the Netherlands. The history of the game show is intriguing as it has a charity for its sponsor. We discuss the game show The Hustler and we have details for how you can win a pair of tickets for the Southern Fried Gaming Expo!

This week we talk about the talk show that is lumped in with game shows, Love Connection. Mike explains Chuck's famous "2 and 2" and we dish the details on our first live appearance!!

This week's episode (or maybe we should say this month's episode) is finally here this week! We are featuring Love connection and we have details about our first live appearance. Check it out!

We are super excited to begin season three with a bang! We cover probably the greatest and most well known game show of all time, Jeopardy! Plus, we bring on a six time champion Dave Leach to take us behind the scenes of being on the show. Christian is back for Stump or Chump and we have a devil of a time playing the game from This Week in Game Show History. THIS SHOW IS PACKED!

This week we are not only diving into America's most loved game show, but also interviewing a 6 time winner as well! Join us as we kick off season three with a bang!

Its the last one and thank goodness because Tom sounds like he is in a cave. We talk about late night tv, game show news and this week in gameshow history!
